rooms.description: Minimalist entrance with a Vastu-compliant entrance design and natural lighting.
Open-plan living space with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, adhering to Vastu principles by maintaining the energy flow.
Compact kitchen integrated with dining area, designed for efficiency and minimalism.
Minimalist bedroom with ample storage and a private balcony for relaxation.
Essential bathroom integrated within the master suite.
Serene library space overlooking the garden for relaxation and reading.
